title: Hackathon 2025
description: With initial corpora entered into the database, hackathon to work with and analyse the data, driven by scientific inquiries and leading to early results.

title: Collaborators' Meeting #2
description: Orientation of collaborators with the data model, discussion of final adjustments, and beginning of data entry.

title: Collaborators' Meeting #1
description: Break ground on adjusting the data model in accordance with the needs of diverse corpora.

title: Kickoff Conference
description: Kick-off conference, inviting the scientific community to interrogate the key questions of the project.

title: Public Conference: Les Manuscrits perdus de l'Europe médiévale
description: Lecture to the general public presenting LostMA, and its current results and objectives; then broadcasted online.
